name: RUN FROM THE STEEL - REMASTERED
description:
With the power of Unreal Engine 5, we bring you the remastered version of RUN FROM THE STEEL!

-Ray traced global illumination
-Volumetric fog and smoke
-New particles
-Ray traced reflections

Try to pass testing courses by fighting enemy machines and escape the facility. You will unlock new weapons, tools and skills along the way.

There are multiple types of enemies, that will force you to use your whole arsenal. You can unlock multiple skills and upgrades from loot boxes after each level.

Play now for free!
